content: To the Chief Musician; with stringed instruments. A skillful song,  a didactic  reflective poem, of David, when the Ziphites went and told Saul, “David is hiding among us.”
And vindicate me by Your [wondrous] power.
Listen to the words of my mouth.
For strangers have risen against me
And violent men have sought my life;
They have not set God before them.
